To view a list of participating bars and restaurants, click here . Who: Dozens of bars and restaurants across Center City What: Happy hour offering $7 cocktails, $6 wine, $5 beer and half-priced appetizers When: 5 p.m. to 7 p.m., every Wednesday, June 4 through August 27, 2025 Where: Center City Philadelphia The following select locations will provide 15% off dinner after 7 p.m. - discounted dinner locations . From outdoor beer gardens and cocktail lounges to dance bars and some of the best restaurants in Philadelphia, there’s a place for everyone at CCD SIPS. Learn More SIPS Merch Celebrate the 21st birthday of Center City SIPS with a limited edition SIPS T-shirt, available for pre-order now. Explore Center City SIPS at CCD Parks Every Wednesday from June 4 to August 27, from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m., enjoy $7 Hornitos® Tequila cocktails, $6 wine and $5 beer at SIPS happy hour al fresco at Dilworth Park and Cret Park. Sponsor Cocktail Recipes Try CCD SIPS featured drink recipes to create great Hornitos®  Tequila cocktails at home. Sign up here to receive CCD email updates. Interests In Center City Rail Park Updates Publications and Reports The Center City District (CCD), Central Philadelphia Development Corporation (CPDC) and Center City District Foundation (CCDF) work together to enhance the vitality and competitiveness of Philadelphia's downtown. In 1991, the business leadership organization CPDC created the CCD business improvement district to deliver daily services with the goal of making Center City clean and safe. This helped transform Center City into a vibrant 24-hour downtown, attractive to businesses, residents, students, shoppers and tourists. In addition, the CCD is responsible for the management of Dilworth, Sister Cities, John F. Collins and Cret Parks, four extraordinary public spaces in the heart of Center City. CCDF, the charitable affiliate of the CCD, was launched in 2016 to support the next generation of public space improvements in Center City Philadelphia. Sip Social | Mobile Cocktail Bar | Formerly Mix & Muddle top of page HOME ABOUT SERVICES GALLERY CONTACT OUR CLIENTS drink curious About Us Sip Social , formerly known as Mix & Muddle , is a luxury events studio aimed at passionately delivering curious cocktails for weddings, marketing & PR events, brand activations, and corporate parties. Set up by mixologist and events expert Richard Maxted in 2017, we've executed over 400 events nationwide and internationally , and designed hundreds of curious cocktails. Personable, precise, and stylish at the core. LINE UP Our Team Damien O'Leary Staffing Manager Richard Maxted Director & Founder Lars Thornhill Operations Manager Services Corporate Events Marketing & PR launches, sophisticated drinks receptions, and office parties Wedding Parties Reception and after dinner cocktail bars Brand Partnerships Brand activations, photographic content creation, and Perfect Serve creations Get in Touch Curious about how we can elevate your next event? Let's chat. 61 Central Street, London, EC1V 3AF +44 7815 601758 richard@sipsocial.co.uk Name Phone Email Message How did you hear about us? Send Thanks for reaching out! We'll be in touch within 24hrs. Connect With Us @SipSocialUK Our Clients Sip Social is the trading name of Mix & Muddle Limited. Company Number 145718806. © 2025 by Sip Social. About Gus' Gus’ Sip & Dip, brings a classic tavern experience to the heart of River North, welcoming walk-ins on a first-come, first-served basis. Our beverage menu, created by Kevin Beary, offers high-quality cocktails at an approachable price, paired perfectly with Chef Bob Broskey’s timeless tavern dishes. Get Hours & Directions The Team Scott Kitsmiller / Bar Manager Kitsmiller’s journey from musician to bar professional has been fueled by a love for nightlife and creativity, beginning with performing in Detroit’s vibrant bar scene and evolving into a career in cocktail innovation. After years as Bar Manager for Three Dots and a Dash and The Bamboo Room, Scott joins the Gus’ Sip & Dip team as the Bar Manager. Bob Broskey / Executive Chef Bob Broskey, Executive Chef Partner of Gus’ Sip & Dip, brings his culinary expertise from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, where his passion for cooking was nurtured in a family of talented cooks. Broskey honed his craft in Chicago at renowned Michelin-starred restaurants like Ria and L2O before making a name for himself at Intro, where he earned recognition as one of Zagat’s “30 Under 30.” Joining RPM Seafood in 2019, Broskey’s dedication and skill have earned him a partnership within the RPM family of restaurants. He now oversees chef teams nationwide across various RPM concepts, including RPM Italian, RPM Steak, RPM Seafood as well as Pizzeria Portofino and The Oakville. At Gus’ Sip & Dip, Broskey has crafted a menu of timeless tavern dishes that perfectly complements Beary’s cocktail program. Kevin Beary / Beverage Director Kevin Beary leads the beverage program at Gus’ Sip & Dip, bringing a deep understanding of historic recipes and a creative touch that elevates our cocktail offerings. Before joining Gus’ Sip & Dip, Kevin spent years at the helm of Three Dots and a Dash and The Bamboo Room, both celebrated for their exceptional cocktail experiences. Under his leadership, The Bamboo Room earned recognition as one of Esquire’s Best Bars in America and a North America’s 50 Best ‘One To Watch.’ His expertise continues to set the standard for excellence in Chicago’s cocktail scene. F.A.Q. Looking to host an event? Please fill out the form here and someone from our events team will be in touch soon. How do I get on the waitlist? As soon as you arrive, check in with the host to put your name on the waitlist. How late do you serve food until? We serve food until 12AM Sunday – Thursday and 1AM on Friday and Saturday. Are you kid friendly? We are 21+ only. Are there gluten free options available? Of course, many dishes on the menu can be made gluten free. Please notify your bartender or server about any allergies/dietary restrictions. Do you offer any vegetarian or vegan options? Yes we offer several vegetarian items and limited vegan options. Please ask your bartender or server for guidance on the menu. Do you accept reservations? We are walk-in only. When is Happy Hour? Happy Hour is available Monday – Friday from 4PM-5PM, featuring a rotating cocktail of the day for $6. Do You Offer Non-alcoholic Options? Yes! Several cocktails on our menu have their number underlined, indicating they can be made without alcohol. Do You Have Valet? Yes, it can be found just outside the restaurant. Valet is available until 11pm daily Stay in the know Sign up for our email list to stay up to date on exclusive offers, special events, seasonal specials, and more. First Name* Last Name* Email* Zip * SIGN ME UP × EAT. PLAY. WIN. We can set up a bar, tasting event or cocktail masterclass at any venue, including at your home! It’s important to us that we stock our event bars with premium, independent and upcoming brands. Using our knowledge and experience we ensure that our drinks are kept and served at their optimum, always with professional and friendly service. Formed in 2017 but with many more years of hospitality experience, we have managed a range of events. Our knowledge, along with your requirements, allows us to provide the perfect service for your event. EVENT & MOBILE BAR HIRE SPECIALISTS EVENT MOBILE BAR HIRE WITH QUALITY PRODUCTS, PROFESSIONAL, FRIENDLY SERVICE AND DRINK SOLUTIONS FOR EVERY EVENT. BASED FROM STRATFORD-UPON-AVON, WARWICKSHIRE, COVERING THE UK CONTACT US CONTACT US CONTACT US Sip 'n' Swig 5.0 Based on 37 reviews powered by G o o g l e review us on Alicia Henstock 11:31 21 Oct 24 We had a lovely birthday celebration of nine friends at our house and Giles was a brilliant host! Cocktails were delicious and we had a lot of fun; much giggling, especially by the third one. He supplied all the cocktail shakers, glassware and ingredients, so it was very easy on us. We’re deciding when to have the next one. Tania Noble 20:58 10 Oct 24 Sip n Swig provided the bar and drinks for 100 people at our party, and did a fabulous job. Everyone commented on how delicious their cocktails were, and it was great they could also offer mocktails. All their staff were very helpful, anccommodating and friendly. Highly recommend them! Helen Hunt 09:20 01 Oct 24 Sip and Swig provided a cocktail bar at our party. Both Giles and Jodie provided the most amazing cockails and service, they went down an absolute treat with our guests. Thank you. Verity Harris 18:58 30 Jul 24 Best cocktail class ever! Holly Nixon 17:21 25 Jun 24 We organised a cocktail making masterclass for 16 of my networking group ladies and we had a blast.  Giles and team made sure we had everything we needed, joined in the fun and ensured a great time was had by all. We had a mixture of alcoholic and non-alcoholic cocktails which meant that everyone got to participate and we can't wait to have another event like this.  Highly recommend. H P 16:09 23 Feb 24 I totally recommend the cocktail masterclass it was excellent. I booked it for my friend's hen weekend and it was one of the best experiences we had. Giles gave us a great class which was really fun and interesting and Giles and Jodie made a really big effort to accommodate our group (vegan, gluten free options and non-alcoholic spirits) which we really appreciated and meant that everyone really enjoyed it. Thank you to Sip 'n' Swig, we had the best time! Jade Monks 12:52 10 Aug 23 The team at Sip 'n' Swig were fabulous! Couldn't recommend more. Hired for a social event at my company. The cocktails were delicious and looked great. Very happy colleagues and will definitely use Sip n Swig again. SIP SOCIETY MOBILE BAR We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. By using our site, you consent to the use of cookies. Rejecting cookies will prevent non-essential cookies from loading. Learn more Accept all Accept essential About Us Services Schedule a Call Gallery Contact Us Serving all of Connecticut & Massachusetts About Us Services Gallery Contact Us Serving all of Connecticut & Massachusetts Elevate Your Event with Premium Mobile Bartending From unforgettable cocktails to seamless service, we bring the bar to you. Book today to make your event a standout experience! CONTACT US Whether it’s a wedding, corporate gathering, or private party, we’ll take care of everything, so you can enjoy a worry-free celebration. Stress-Free Bar Service We Handle Every Detail, So You Can Enjoy Your Event! Planning & Coordination We’ll begin by discussing your desired guest experience, from cocktail styles to service details. 30 days before the event, we'll confirm final touches and review any extra services. We're also happy to coordinate with your event planner for seamless execution. Alcohol Preparation While we can’t legally supply alcohol, we’ll provide a thorough alcohol purchase guide detailing exact quantities, bottle sizes, types, and recommendations, making your selection process easy and worry-free. Set - Up & Service Before guests arrive, we handle full bar setup, ensuring everything is in place for a smooth start. We simply ask that the alcohol is accessible in a designated area, and we’ll bring all mixers, garnishes, cups, ice, and anything else needed for service. When bar service begins, our primary focus is providing your guests with an outstanding experience. Breakdown & Wrap-Up After service, we handle cleanup, packing any leftover alcohol and leaving it ready for you in the designated area. Prepare for compliments on the unforgettable bar experience—we’ll leave you with wonderful memories to toast to for years to come! With SIP SOCIETY , your event’s bar service will be one less thing to worry about. We’re here to bring your vision to life with care and professionalism , ensuring a memorable occasion for you and your guests. CONTACT US Dry Hire Bar Service Tailored for Your Unique Event Dry hire is a service where we provide everything for your bar—except the alcohol. We supply the equipment, mixers, drinkware, ice, and bartenders, while you choose and purchase the alcohol. You’ll have full control over your selections, and we’ll guide you on quantities and types. It's the perfect choice for flexibility and a customized bar experience. So, as I like to say… Sit Back, Relax, and Be a Guest at Your Own Party! Add-Ons to Elevate Your Event Experience Champagne Wall Make a Statement with Our Stunning Champagne Wall! Perfect for weddings, parties, or upscale gatherings, our Champagne Wall adds an elegant touch to your celebration. With capacity to hold up to 50 champagne glasses, it serves as both a functional drink station and an eye-catching display. Use it to greet guests with a bubbly surprise or even showcase treats, seating charts, or floral arrangements. Complete with customizable vinyl decals to match your event’s theme, this centerpiece is sure to impress! Self-Service Hydration Station Keep Guests Refreshed with a Chic Hydration Station! Offer your guests a stylish way to stay hydrated with our Self-Service Hydration Station. Choose from refreshing options like infused water, lemonade, or classic ice water—beautifully displayed in elegant dispensers. This setup is ideal for outdoor events, cocktail hours, or anytime you want to keep your guests cool and comfortable. Self-serve and hassle-free, it’s a thoughtful touch that shows you care about every detail. Champagne Toast Service Raise a Glass in Style with Our Champagne Toast Service! Let us take care of the bubbly for your special moments. Our team will chill, pop, and pour champagne for all your guests, ensuring everyone has a glass in hand to celebrate. Whether it’s a wedding toast, an anniversary, or a corporate milestone, we’ll make sure the experience is seamless, sophisticated, and unforgettable. Cheers to a perfect celebration! Table-Side Wine Service Elevate Your Event with Personalized Table-Side Wine Service! Bring the luxury of fine dining to your event with our Table-Side Wine Service. Our professional bartenders will pour wine directly for your guests, ensuring a polished and attentive touch throughout your dinner or celebration. Perfect for weddings, formal dinners, or upscale events, this service adds sophistication and ensures your guests feel pampered. Dessert Favor Wall Sweeten Your Celebration with Our Dessert Favor Wall! Make your desserts and favors a show-stopping centerpiece with our Dessert Favor Wall. Perfect for weddings, baby showers, and parties, this versatile display transforms treats like donuts, cupcakes, cookies, or small packaged favors into a stunning visual experience. Fully customizable with decals to match your theme, this rental is a creative and stylish way to wow your guests and make dessert time unforgettable! Event Highlights < > Ready to Elevate Your Event? Get Quote Now! Hi, I am Carla the founder of Sip Society Mobile Bar & Events , and I couldn’t be more excited that you’ve found us! After over a decade balancing a career in corporate management with my passion for bartending, I decided to follow my dream of creating something all my own—and thus, Sip Society was born. From the moment I stepped into event bartending, I was hooked. Each event brings something unique, introducing me to incredible people and unforgettable experiences. I quickly realized that this was more than just a job; it was my calling. Helping people celebrate life’s biggest moments in a way that feels special, effortless, and fun is exactly where I want to be. The best part of building this business? Forming a top-tier team of bartenders who share the same enthusiasm for creating exceptional experiences. I’ve been fortunate to work alongside some of the best in the industry, and I knew exactly who I wanted on this journey with me. Together, we bring dedication, expertise, and energy to every event we serve. We can’t wait to make your celebration unforgettable. With Sip Society, you get more than just bar service—you get a personalized experience. Cheers to unforgettable memories! Frequently Asked Questions What areas do you serve? We proudly serve all of Connecticut and Massachusetts. Based in Putnam, we’re happy to travel to bring our services to you. There is no travel fee for events within a 30-mile radius of Putnam. For locations beyond 30 miles, a small travel fee will apply. What types of events do you cater to? We’re here for all your special moments, including weddings, rehearsal dinners, bridal and baby showers, graduations, private parties, corporate events, and much more! Do you supply the alcohol or should I supply it? Due to state liquor laws, we’re unable to provide alcohol directly. However, we’ll make the process easy for you by offering a comprehensive shopping list with the exact quantities and types of alcohol needed. We handle everything else to ensure a safe, fun, and memorable event! If my venue has a bar space, can you set that up? Absolutely! We’re flexible and can work with existing bar spaces at your venue. We also offer additional bar setups to meet your needs, whether it’s for multiple bar stations or a dedicated cocktail hour setup. What is the deposit requirement? To secure your date, we require a $250 non-refundable deposit. The remaining balance is due 14 days before your event. How far in advance should I book, and what is your cancellation policy ? The sooner, the better! Early booking ensures we can reserve your date. However, feel free to inquire about availability for last-minute events—we’ll do our best to accommodate! View cancellation policy here. Are you insured and are your bartenders certified? Yes, we proudly carry a comprehensive General & Liquor Liability insurance policy, giving our clients added security and peace of mind. Upon request, we can provide copies of our insurance policies directly to your venue. Additionally, all of our bartenders are TIPS Certified, meaning they are professionally trained in responsible alcohol service, ensuring your event is not only enjoyable but safe. Is gratuity included in your fees? Gratuity is not included in our standard fees. We offer several options: - Tip Jar: We can place a tip jar on the bar for guests to contribute. - No Tip Jar: If you prefer no tip jar, the event host can add a 22% gratuity per bartender, based on the final invoice. - Combination Option: A mix of both, with a tip jar on the bar and a partial gratuity fee. Get a Tailored Quote for Your Event ! Tell Us About Your Vision- We'll Handle the Cocktails! Mobile Cocktail Bar Hire UK - Sip 'n' Swig Stratford Skip to main content Hit enter to search or ESC to close Close Search search 0 Menu Home Sip ‘n’ Swig HQ HQ Info HQ Events Bar Hire Corporate Event Bar Hire Mobile Cocktail Bar Hire Event Bars Wedding Bar Hire Gin Tasting Events Shop Cocktail Cans Experiences Gift Vouchers Gift Packs Gin & Spirits Wine Cocktail Juices, Purees and Syrups Craft Beer Cans FAQs Cocktail Making Classes Blog Case Studies Blog Get in Touch search 0 was successfully added to your cart. Menu Home » Mobile Cocktail Bar Hire Mobile Cocktail Bar Hire Private events from £180 Package example - 100 cocktails over 2 hours, including staff, glassware etc. excluding travel £1130 Premium Products Trained cocktail bartenders Personalised cocktail menus and cocktails Pop up bar structures availablefor inside or out Mobile Cocktail Bar Hire or you could consider a cocktail making class or cocktail cans Shop Now Shop Now Shop Now When an event needs sophistication, excitement and wow factor to impress your guests, what is better than a mobile cocktail bar with your own cocktail bartender on hand to mix up your favourite cocktails? We come to you and set up our rustic wooden mobile bar for any event. Stocked with personalised cocktails, a selection of favourites or some true classics, all of our cocktails are hand made with quality, fresh ingredients, with alcohol or without. Giles was trained with the Savoy Group and has passed his training on to all of our cocktail bartender’s so you know you’re getting a ‘proper’ cocktail! We are based in Warwickshire but travel all over the UK with our mobile cocktail bars. Cocktail bar hire is popular for hen and stag parties, celebrations at home, product launches, birthday parties and more! Your cocktail bartender will bring all of the equipment, spirits, mixers, garnishes, ice, glassware etc. so you can just relax and enjoy alongside your guests! Sample Menu Sample Menu Sample Menu FAQ’s Where do you travel to? We’re based in Stratford-upon-Avon, Warwickshire but work all over the country and abroad too. Although travel costs apply, we can travel to wherever your event may be! What will the bar look like? We have our own rustic wooden bars or modern bar structures that you can have your own printed front on. We can also work off a bar structure or even a suitable vehicle that you provide, we have a number of contacts if you are looking for something a little different. We’ve also worked off kitchen islands and garden bars, message us to see how we can make your space work. The smallest bar we have is 1m, this could service up to around 50 guests. Our normal rustic wooden bars are 1.5m so we suggest a 2m x 2m space. We also use two rustic bars together for larger events. There are no restrictions on where we can access with our pop up bars. If you are having draft beer, we will need power, otherwise, just the space. We do have a 3x3m gazebo we can use for outside spaces. What cocktails do you serve? We will give you a cocktail menu to choose from, most can be made alcoholic or non, but we’re always open to consider other favourite cocktails! We suggest 4 cocktail options to be served and all of our cocktails are full strength, made fresh to order with fresh and quality ingredients. We aren’t self taught cocktail makers following recipes, Giles trained with the Savoy Group and his cocktails knowledge and training is passed on to the team, all of our cocktails are made to his recipes so you always have a consistent cocktail from Sip ‘n’ Swig. Our cocktails are always served in glassware, unless specifically requested otherwise. Do you do dry hire or staff only? We do not offer dry hire. As a general rule, we do not offer staff only however please contact us if this is what you require as there may be options. Can I have a cash bar at my event? Yes we can ensure the correct licences are in place whether you want to provide all drinks for your guests, a capped number for each guest or you want a full cash bar where guests purchase their own drinks. In this case a booking fee and minimum spend would apply. Guests can pay by cash or card. How many people do you cater for? Cocktail Bars work best for more than 25 guests due to our minimums. We can run cocktail bars for weddings, festivals and balls. There are options for any party size so please get in touch to discuss your requirements. Can you personalise my event? Yes absolutely, think brand coloured cocktails, cocktail toppers with event details or company logo on or custom printed bar front, cocktails renamed to suit your event, personalised drinks tokens, the list is endless, chat to us about personalising your bar, drinks and cocktails; it’s what we do best! How much will it cost? Our Booking Fee for a private event is £150 (plus VAT). Your booking fee secures your date reservation, at least one senior member of the Sip ‘n’ Swig team, bar hire or structure sourcing as required (if an alternative structure is required to those that we provide, additional costs may be incurred) and all consumables. We are a fully licensed and insured company. If your event requires a Temporary Events Notice (TEN) we can ensure that this is in place. Depending on your event requirements you will have staff costs, travel and drinks. For example, a cocktail bar with 2-3 hours of service and 100 cocktails served. Menu of 4 bespoke cocktails for guests to choose from (choice of alcoholic / non alcoholic) All cocktails are made fresh to order for your guests. Travel included within 10 miles of Stratford (outside of this additional charges apply) Event package price: £1,450 inc VAT (includes booking fee) We will have a minimum amount of cocktails based on the amount of guests, we generally suggest cocktails are served for 2-3 hours at any event. If we are running a full bar, we will include cocktails throughout. Our Promise Professional, friendly and knowledgeable staff from Sip ‘n’ Swig A bar stocked with premium, independent, new to market and local products. Freshly made, full strength and well-balanced cocktails Complete peace of mind, we take care of everything so you can sit back and enjoy the party A personal touch, we are a family run business and treat every event as if it were our own with a genuine love for what we do A bespoke bar offering unique to you through personalisation and branding – we will help you put your stamp on it Contact Us Use this form to send us an email about your next event Name (Required) First Last Email (Required) Phone (Required) Type of event (Required) Select Corporate Event Private Event Wedding Bar Product - Cocktail Cans/Gin Masterclasses Other Where did you hear about us? Arrange a call or request any quote amendments. 4 Upon quote acceptance and Booking Fee payment, your date is secured. From here we’ll finalise details like cocktail choices and bar branding. 5 We handle everything: drinks, glassware, ice, garnishes and staff. 6 We’ll confirm all details 14 days before your event, but feel free to reach out anytime. 7 For larger events, access your own portal to track requirements, timings, and drink selections. 8 Trust us to deliver on time and impress your guests with exceptional service and a touch of class.
